summary: Fictionalized documentary showing the evolution of witchcraft, from its pagan roots to its confusion with hysteria in Eastern Europe.
cast: Maren Pedersen|Clara Pontoppidan|Elith Pio|Oscar Stribolt|Tora Teje|John Andersen|Benjamin Christensen|Poul Reumert|Karen Winther|Kate Fabian|Else Vermehren|Astrid Holm|Johannes Andersen|Gerda Madsen|Aage Hertel|Ib Schønberg|Emmy Schønfeld|Frederik Christensen|Ella La Cour|Elisabeth Christensen|Henry Seemann|Alice O'Fredericks|Knud Rassow|William S. Burroughs|Ellen Rassow|Holst Jørgensen|H.C. Nielsen|Albrecht Schmidt|Karina Bell|Karen Caspersen|Holger Pedersen
title: La brujería a través de los tiempos
